title: The Face & Eye Tracking Rabbit Hole [VRChat]
description:
I dove into the world of Face and Eye Tracking in VRChat! What seems like only a niche technology, hides a fascinating peek at the future of online communication. I interviewed leaders in the community, who spend their time shaping open-source hardware and software to bring this extra bit of realism to our interactions.

Checkout SideQuest’s physics based social VR app BANTER for a chance to win a FREE Quest 3: https://sidequestvr.com/app/10831/banter-public-beta?utm_source=phia_03_03_2024
